item.title: Whew. How i hate PXE.
item.description: So i spent most of today attempting to boot my soekris 4521 via PXE to install freebsd. It is killing me. i am going to punch it. wait. i have punched it. over and over again. i punched it in its goddamn eyes. In other words and other worlds - i attempted to use monowall to jumpstart my box. however - it didn’t work, they don’t have a shell to log into.
